content: अट्ट {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अट्टयति अनाद्रियते अन्यत् यत्र; अट्ट्-घञ्] {@--1@} High, lofty; loud. {@--2@} Frequent, constant (in comp). {@--3@} Dried, dry. --ट्टः --ट्टं [आधारे घञ्] {@--1@} An apartment on the roof or upper story, a garret. {@--2@} A turret, buttress, tower; गोपुर° <ls>Māl. 9. 1</ls>; नरेंद्रमार्गाट्टइव <ls>R. 6. 67</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 11.</ls> {@--3@} A market-place, market (probably for हट्ट). {@--4@} A fine linen cloth. {@--5@} A palace, palatial building. {@--6@} Killing, injuring. {@--7@} Excess, superiority. --ट्टं Food, boiled rice; अट्टशूला जनपदाः <ls>Mb.</ls> (अट्टं अन्नं शूलं विक्रेयं येषां ते <ls>Nīlakaṇṭha</ls>).
